quiz.question: _____ disparagingly
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑地,轻蔑地说话。He would speak disparagingly about his competitors to undermine their reputation.他会轻蔑地谈论他的竞争对手以破坏他们的声誉。

quiz.question: ___ grudgingly
quiz.explanation: 勉强地,勉强地点头。She would nod grudgingly when forced to admit she was wrong.当被迫承认自己错了时,她会勉强地点头。

quiz.question: _____ obligingly
quiz.explanation: 乐意地,乐意地微笑。The helpful clerk would smile obligingly while assisting customers.乐于助人的店员在帮助顾客时会乐意地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ unblushingly
quiz.explanation: 厚颜无耻地,厚颜无耻地说。He would say unblushingly that he deserved all the credit.他会厚颜无耻地说他应该得到所有的功劳。

quiz.question: _________ scathingly
quiz.explanation: 严厉地,严厉地批评。The reviewer would criticize scathingly the poorly written novel.评论家会严厉地批评这部写得很差的小说。

quiz.question: ___ soothingly
quiz.explanation: 抚慰地,抚慰地说。The nurse would say soothingly to calm the frightened child.护士会抚慰地说话来安抚受惊的孩子。

quiz.question: _____ willingly
quiz.explanation: 心甘情愿地,心甘情愿地同意。He would agree willingly to help with the community project.他会心甘情愿地同意帮助社区项目。

quiz.question: ___ cajolingly
quiz.explanation: 哄骗地,哄骗地问。The child would ask cajolingly for just one more cookie.孩子会哄骗地要求再来一块饼干。

quiz.question: startlingly _____
quiz.explanation: 惊人地,惊人地清晰。The mountain view was startlingly clear after the storm passed.暴风雨过后,山景惊人地清晰。

quiz.question: dazzlingly ______
quiz.explanation: 耀眼地,耀眼地明亮。The snow reflected dazzlingly bright sunlight that hurt their eyes.雪反射出耀眼地明亮的阳光,刺痛了他们的眼睛。

quiz.question: ____ wonderingly
quiz.explanation: 惊奇地,惊奇地看。The child would look wonderingly at the magician's incredible tricks.孩子会惊奇地看着魔术师不可思议的戏法。

quiz.question: _____ witheringly
quiz.explanation: 讽刺地,讽刺地回答。She would reply witheringly to put down anyone who challenged her.她会讽刺地回答以贬低任何挑战她的人。

quiz.question: ___ despairingly
quiz.explanation: 绝望地,绝望地抽泣。The bereaved mother would sob despairingly at her child's grave.失去孩子的母亲会在孩子的坟墓前绝望地抽泣。

quiz.question: ____ enquiringly
quiz.explanation: 询问地,询问地看。The dog would look enquiringly at its owner hoping for a treat.狗会询问地看着主人希望得到零食。

quiz.question: ___ inquiringly
quiz.explanation: 好奇地,好奇地问。The journalist would ask inquiringly about every aspect of the story.记者会好奇地询问故事的每个方面。

quiz.question: _____ accusingly
quiz.explanation: 责备地,责备地凝视。She would stare accusingly at the suspect during the interrogation.在审讯期间,她会责备地凝视嫌疑人。

quiz.question: _____ musingly
quiz.explanation: 沉思地,沉思地微笑。He would smile musingly while reminiscing about old times.在回忆往事时,他会沉思地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ placatingly
quiz.explanation: 安抚地,安抚地说话。The manager would speak placatingly to calm the angry customer.经理会安抚地说话来平息愤怒的顾客。

quiz.question: ____ gloatingly
quiz.explanation: 幸灾乐祸地,幸灾乐祸地咧嘴笑。The villain would grin gloatingly after his evil plan succeeded.恶棍在邪恶计划成功后会幸灾乐祸地咧嘴笑。

quiz.question: ______ bitingly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地,尖刻地回答。She would answer bitingly when irritated by stupid questions.当被愚蠢的问题激怒时,她会尖刻地回答。

quiz.question: ______ tauntingly
quiz.explanation: 嘲弄地,嘲弄地反驳。The bully would retort tauntingly to provoke a fight.恶霸会嘲弄地反驳以挑起打斗。

quiz.question: ___ disconcertingly
quiz.explanation: 令人不安地,令人不安地说。He would say disconcertingly honest things at inappropriate times.他会在不适当的时候令人不安地说实话。

quiz.question: ____ sportingly
quiz.explanation: 有风度地,有风度地比赛。The team would play sportingly even when losing badly.即使输得很惨,球队也会有风度地比赛。

quiz.question: ___ unwittingly
quiz.explanation: 无意中,无意中说。He would say unwittingly things that offended others.他会无意中说出冒犯他人的话。

quiz.question: ______ cuttingly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地,尖刻地评论。She would remark cuttingly about people's flaws and mistakes.她会尖刻地评论人们的缺点和错误。

quiz.question: ____ reprovingly
quiz.explanation: 责备地,责备地看。The teacher would look reprovingly at students who misbehaved.老师会责备地看着行为不端的学生。

quiz.question: ____ pityingly
quiz.explanation: 怜悯地,怜悯地看。She would look pityingly at the homeless man on the street.她会怜悯地看着街上的无家可归者。

quiz.question: _____ smugly
quiz.explanation: 自鸣得意地,自鸣得意地微笑。He would smile smugly after proving everyone else wrong.在证明其他人都错了之后,他会自鸣得意地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ rashly
quiz.explanation: 轻率地,轻率地行动。Don't act rashly without considering all the consequences first.不要不先考虑所有后果就轻率地行动。

quiz.question: ______ mulishly
quiz.explanation: 固执地,固执地拒绝。The stubborn child would refuse mulishly to eat his vegetables.固执的孩子会固执地拒绝吃蔬菜。

quiz.question: _____ owlishly
quiz.explanation: 像猫头鹰般地,像猫头鹰般地眨眼。The sleepy professor would blink owlishly behind his thick glasses.困倦的教授会在厚眼镜后像猫头鹰般地眨眼。

quiz.question: ______ snappishly
quiz.explanation: 暴躁地,暴躁地回答。The tired mother would answer snappishly when interrupted.疲惫的母亲被打断时会暴躁地回答。

quiz.question: ____ feverishly
quiz.explanation: 狂热地,狂热地工作。The team would work feverishly to meet the tight deadline.团队会狂热地工作以赶上紧迫的截止日期。

quiz.question: __ unearthly
quiz.explanation: 可怕的,可怕的嚎叫。An unearthly howl echoed through the dark forest at midnight.一声可怕的嚎叫在午夜的黑暗森林中回荡。

quiz.question: _____ moodily
quiz.explanation: 情绪低落地,情绪低落地说话。The teenager would speak moodily when asked about school.当被问及学校时,青少年会情绪低落地说话。

quiz.question: _____ cagily
quiz.explanation: 谨慎地,谨慎地回答。The suspect would reply cagily to avoid incriminating himself.嫌疑人会谨慎地回答以避免自证其罪。

quiz.question: ____ creakily
quiz.explanation: 嘎吱嘎吱地,嘎吱嘎吱地走。The elderly man would walk creakily with his arthritic joints.老人会带着关节炎的关节嘎吱嘎吱地走。

quiz.question: ____ cheekily
quiz.explanation: 厚颜无耻地,厚颜无耻地咧嘴笑。The mischievous boy would grin cheekily after playing a prank.淘气的男孩在恶作剧后会厚颜无耻地咧嘴笑。

quiz.question: sulkily ______
quiz.explanation: 生闷气地,生闷气地拒绝。The child would sulkily refuse to apologize for his behavior.孩子会生闷气地拒绝为自己的行为道歉。

quiz.question: ____ jerkily
quiz.explanation: 急促地,急促地移动。The old robot would move jerkily with its worn mechanical parts.旧机器人会用磨损的机械部件急促地移动。

quiz.question: _____ huskily
quiz.explanation: 沙哑地,沙哑地说话。After smoking for years, he would speak huskily in a raspy voice.吸烟多年后,他会用粗哑的声音沙哑地说话。

quiz.question: ____ gloomily
quiz.explanation: 忧郁地,忧郁地叹气。He would sigh gloomily while contemplating his financial troubles.在思考财务困境时,他会忧郁地叹气。

quiz.question: ____ doily
quiz.explanation: 花边垫,蕾丝花边垫。The antique table was decorated with a delicate lace doily.古董桌子用精致的蕾丝花边垫装饰。

quiz.question: ________ grumpily
quiz.explanation: 脾气暴躁地,脾气暴躁地抱怨。The old man would complain grumpily about noise from the neighbors.老人会脾气暴躁地抱怨邻居的噪音。

quiz.question: ____ wearily
quiz.explanation: 疲倦地,疲倦地打哈欠。The exhausted worker would yawn wearily during the long meeting.精疲力竭的工人会在漫长的会议中疲倦地打哈欠。

quiz.question: _____ warily
quiz.explanation: 谨慎地,谨慎地观察。The deer would watch warily for predators while drinking water.鹿在喝水时会谨慎地观察捕食者。

quiz.question: _____ cheerily
quiz.explanation: 快乐地,快乐地微笑。Despite the rain, she would smile cheerily and stay positive.尽管下雨,她还是会快乐地微笑并保持积极。

quiz.question: ____ airily
quiz.explanation: 轻快地,轻快地挥手。She would wave airily as if nothing important had happened.她会轻快地挥手,好像什么重要的事都没发生。

quiz.question: ____ clumsily
quiz.explanation: 笨拙地,笨拙地走。The penguin would walk clumsily across the ice.企鹅会笨拙地走过冰面。

quiz.question: _____ fussily
quiz.explanation: 挑剔地,挑剔地打扮。The perfectionist would dress fussily spending hours choosing outfits.完美主义者会挑剔地打扮,花几个小时挑选服装。

quiz.question: ____ shiftily
quiz.explanation: 鬼鬼祟祟地,鬼鬼祟祟地看。The suspicious character would look shiftily around before stealing.可疑人物在偷窃前会鬼鬼祟祟地环顾四周。

quiz.question: _____ loftily
quiz.explanation: 傲慢地,傲慢地说话。The aristocrat would speak loftily as if above everyone else.贵族会傲慢地说话,好像高人一等。

quiz.question: ____ mightily
quiz.explanation: 用力地,用力地推。The workers would push mightily to move the heavy boulder.工人们会用力地推动沉重的巨石。

quiz.question: ______ haughtily
quiz.explanation: 傲慢地,傲慢地回答。The snob would answer haughtily when addressed by commoners.势利小人被平民称呼时会傲慢地回答。

quiz.question: ______ jauntily
quiz.explanation: 活泼地,活泼地大步走。The confident man would stride jauntily down the street whistling.自信的男人会活泼地大步走在街上吹着口哨。

quiz.question: _____ hastily
quiz.explanation: 匆忙地,匆忙地离开。They had to leave hastily when the fire alarm sounded.火警响起时,他们不得不匆忙地离开。

quiz.question: _____ nastily
quiz.explanation: 恶毒地,恶毒地回答。The mean girl would reply nastily to hurt others' feelings.刻薄的女孩会恶毒地回答以伤害他人的感情。

quiz.question: ___ testily
quiz.explanation: 暴躁地,暴躁地说。The irritated professor would say testily when students arrived late.当学生迟到时,恼怒的教授会暴躁地说。

quiz.question: ___ hazily
quiz.explanation: 模糊地,模糊地看见。Through the fog, they could only see hazily the outline of buildings.透过雾,他们只能模糊地看见建筑物的轮廓。

quiz.question: _______ wheezily
quiz.explanation: 气喘吁吁地,气喘吁吁地呼吸。The asthmatic patient would breathe wheezily during exercise.哮喘病人在运动时会气喘吁吁地呼吸。

quiz.question: _____ breezily
quiz.explanation: 轻松愉快地,轻松愉快地微笑。She would smile breezily as if she hadn't a care in the world.她会轻松愉快地微笑,好像她没有任何烦恼。

quiz.question: ____ bleakly
quiz.explanation: 凄凉地,凄凉地看。He would look bleakly at the ruins of his burned home.他会凄凉地看着被烧毁的家的废墟。

quiz.question: _____ prickly
quiz.explanation: 易怒地,易怒地说话。The defensive person would speak prickly when criticized.防御心强的人被批评时会易怒地说话。

quiz.question: _____ sleekly
quiz.explanation: 光滑地,光滑地闪耀。The polished car would shine sleekly in the sunlight.抛光的汽车会在阳光下光滑地闪耀。

quiz.question: _____ meekly
quiz.explanation: 温顺地,温顺地同意。The timid employee would agree meekly with whatever the boss said.胆小的员工会温顺地同意老板说的任何话。

quiz.question: _____ blankly
quiz.explanation: 茫然地,茫然地凝视。The confused student would stare blankly at the difficult equation.困惑的学生会茫然地凝视着困难的方程式。

quiz.question: ________ sparkly
quiz.explanation: 闪亮的,闪亮的眼睛。The excited child had sparkly eyes when opening birthday presents.兴奋的孩子在打开生日礼物时眼睛闪亮。

quiz.question: ____ briskly
quiz.explanation: 轻快地,轻快地走。The energetic woman would walk briskly every morning for exercise.精力充沛的女人每天早上会轻快地走以锻炼。

quiz.question: _____ sardonically
quiz.explanation: 讽刺地,讽刺地微笑。The cynic would smile sardonically at people's naive optimism.愤世嫉俗者会讽刺地对人们天真的乐观主义微笑。

quiz.question: _____ emphatically
quiz.explanation: 强调地,强调地陈述。The witness would state emphatically that she saw the crime occur.证人会强调地陈述她看到犯罪发生。

quiz.question: _____ ecstatically
quiz.explanation: 狂喜地,狂喜地欢呼。The fans would cheer ecstatically when their team scored.当他们的球队得分时,球迷们会狂喜地欢呼。

quiz.question: _______ magnetically
quiz.explanation: 有吸引力地,有吸引力地吸引。The charismatic speaker could attract magnetically large audiences.有魅力的演讲者能够有吸引力地吸引大量观众。

quiz.question: uncharacteristically ____
quiz.explanation: 不寻常地,不寻常地迟到。The punctual person arrived uncharacteristically late to the meeting.守时的人不寻常地迟到了会议。

quiz.question: ____ quizzically
quiz.explanation: 疑惑地,疑惑地看。The dog would look quizzically when hearing a strange sound.听到奇怪的声音时,狗会疑惑地看。

quiz.question: _____ regally
quiz.explanation: 华丽地,华丽地打扮。The queen would dress regally in jewels and fine robes.女王会穿着珠宝和华丽长袍华丽地打扮。

quiz.question: _____ cordially
quiz.explanation: 热情地,热情地问候。The host would greet cordially every guest who arrived.主人会热情地问候每一位到达的客人。

quiz.question: _____ genially
quiz.explanation: 亲切地,亲切地微笑。The friendly shopkeeper would smile genially at all customers.友好的店主会亲切地对所有顾客微笑。

quiz.question: ___ magisterially
quiz.explanation: 威严地,威严地说。The judge would say magisterially from his elevated bench.法官会从他的高台上威严地说。

quiz.question: _____ confidentially
quiz.explanation: 机密地,机密地说话。The spy would speak confidentially about classified information.间谍会机密地谈论机密信息。

quiz.question: ___ deferentially
quiz.explanation: 恭敬地,恭敬地鞠躬。The servant would bow deferentially before the nobleman.仆人会在贵族面前恭敬地鞠躬。

quiz.question: _____ jovially
quiz.explanation: 快活地,快活地大笑。Santa Claus would laugh jovially while giving out presents.圣诞老人在分发礼物时会快活地大笑。

quiz.question: ______ abnormally
quiz.explanation: 异常地,异常地行为。The usually calm dog began to behave abnormally before the earthquake.平时很平静的狗在地震前开始异常地行为。

quiz.question: ____ dismally
quiz.explanation: 阴沉地,阴沉地下雨。It continued to rain dismally throughout their entire vacation.他们整个假期一直阴沉地下雨。

quiz.question: ___ diagonally
quiz.explanation: 对角地,对角地切。The chef would cut diagonally to create attractive vegetable slices.厨师会对角地切以制作漂亮的蔬菜片。

quiz.question: ____ conversationally
quiz.explanation: 谈话般地,谈话般地交谈。The interviewer would talk conversationally to put candidates at ease.面试官会谈话般地交谈让候选人放松。

quiz.question: ____ infernally
quiz.explanation: 极其地,极其地疼痛。The broken bone would hurt infernally with every movement.骨折会随着每一个动作极其地疼痛。

quiz.question: _______ incidentally
quiz.explanation: 顺便,顺便提及。He would mention incidentally that he had won the lottery.他会顺便提及他中了彩票。

quiz.question: _____ mortally
quiz.explanation: 致命地,致命地受伤。The soldier was mortally wounded in battle and died hours later.士兵在战斗中致命地受伤,几小时后死亡。

quiz.question: ______ squally
quiz.explanation: 狂风暴雨的,狂风暴雨的天气。The squally weather made sailing dangerous and unpredictable.狂风暴雨的天气使航行变得危险且不可预测。

quiz.question: ___ underbelly
quiz.explanation: 下腹部,下腹部。The documentary exposed the underbelly of organized crime.纪录片揭露了有组织犯罪的阴暗面。

quiz.question: ________ gravelly
quiz.explanation: 沙哑的,沙哑的声音。The old singer had a deep gravelly voice from years of smoking.老歌手因多年吸烟而有着低沉沙哑的声音。

quiz.question: ______ chilly
quiz.explanation: 寒冷的,寒冷的风。A chilly wind blew through the valley making everyone shiver.寒冷的风吹过山谷,让每个人都颤抖。

quiz.question: ______ frilly
quiz.explanation: 有褶边的,有褶边的连衣裙。The little girl wore a pink frilly dress to the party.小女孩穿着粉红色有褶边的连衣裙参加聚会。

quiz.question: ______ shrilly
quiz.explanation: 尖声地,尖声地尖叫。The terrified woman would scream shrilly when seeing the spider.看到蜘蛛时,惊恐的女人会尖声地尖叫。

quiz.question: _____ dully
quiz.explanation: 沉闷地,沉闷地说话。The depressed man would speak dully without any emotion.沮丧的男人会沉闷地说话,没有任何情感。

quiz.question: _____ gleefully
quiz.explanation: 欢快地,欢快地大笑。The children would laugh gleefully while playing in the snow.孩子们在雪中玩耍时会欢快地大笑。

quiz.question: ____ balefully
quiz.explanation: 恶狠狠地,恶狠狠地看。The angry cat would look balefully at anyone who approached.愤怒的猫会恶狠狠地看着任何接近的人。

quiz.question: _____ spitefully
quiz.explanation: 恶意地,恶意地微笑。The vengeful person would smile spitefully at their enemy's misfortune.报复心重的人会对敌人的不幸恶意地微笑。

quiz.question: ____ ruefully
quiz.explanation: 懊悔地,懊悔地看。He would look ruefully at the expensive mistake he had made.他会懊悔地看着他犯下的昂贵错误。

quiz.question: _____ mercifully
quiz.explanation: 仁慈地,仁慈地饶恕。The conqueror would mercifully spare the lives of those who surrendered.征服者会仁慈地饶恕那些投降者的生命。
